channel.title: Help: Running A Server on Linux
channel.description: I've had this old "box" sitting around and I'm thinking about using it as my scape's server, only problem is I don't have the apps to run it. Could someone post them please?

I’ve had this old “box” sitting around and I’m thinking about using it as my scape’s server,
only problem is I don’t have the apps to run it. Could someone post them please?
